attributes.action: Acknowledge the Level of Support Aikman’s Bar Bistro, of St.Andrews Fife, has Within the Local Community and Back All Efforts to Allow for its Recovery
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This initial petition is to register support for Aikman’s Bar Bistro in an official manner, so that this may be used as one of the proofs of the importance this institution has been, is, and will be for people living, studying, playing or passing through St.Andrews Town and University.

Details of the exact circumstances that led to the sudden closure, and of what routes of action can be pursued, will be posted on the Facebook page as and when they become apparent;

http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=99177843784&ref=nf#/group.php?gid=99177843784

Please add your details to the list.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept petitions which call on the PM to "acknowledge" or "recognise" something. More guidance can be found here: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
We also cannot accept petitions which contain links to websites. You may wish to re-word your petition.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
